stories.text:
I just found out about SponsorBlock (https://sponsor.ajay.app/) from the uBlock Origin thread (https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30287172).

What are some other extensions you think people should know about?
stories.title: Ask HN: What browser extensions do you recommend?
Robot photos appear to show melted fuel at Fukushima reactor
Mix and Jam: learn game development by recreating games mechanics
TikTok has the most 3rd party trackers of any social media app

stories.text:
I just got a popup from Zoom saying

"ZOOM [sic] would like to access your location for when you make an emergency call. Location can be based on IP addresses, wireless access point ID, GPS coordinates when available. This will help the emergency response team determine where you are.

[Don't allow] [Allow]"

Here's a screenshot: https://imgur.com/a/cF0mFBI

This is going a bit far, and the explanation is a far fetched too. Who'd make a Zoom call to call an ambulance or the police?
stories.title: Tell HN: Zoom wants to know my location
Intel Announces Bitcoin Mining Roadmap, Bonanza Mine Chips Ship This Year
The Great Resignation: Microsoft Predicts 41% Attrition
David Chalmers: ‘We are the gods of the virtual worlds we create’
